note.p: Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1963 vol 9 pp 261-285, plate, by J S K Boyd
References: T Quinn, 'The Palace of Westminster frescoes, Kelvin's secretary and the Calcutta School of Tropical Medicine', in NR 2006 vol 60 pp 135-137
